name: Axon Kafka Extension v4.6.0
body:
## :star: Features

- Adds an optional to use Kafka based token store which can be used to … [#281](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/281)
- Fix issue 260 by adding a topic function. [#264](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/264)
- Create a TokenStore based on a kafka topic. [#261](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/261)
- Allow filtering or sending different event to different topics in the publisher. [#260](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/260)

## :chart_with_upwards_trend: Enhancements

- Add integration test for the source configurer [#324](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/324)
- Add Cloud event serializer [#321](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/321)
- KafkaPublisher should not be needed when you only want a fetcher. [#306](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/306)
- Fix a code smell I created earlier. [#298](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/298)
- Prepare for 4.6.0 release, also stop creating and deleting the same topics, which makes the tests more reliable. [#293](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/293)
- Updated serializer configuration and made them lazy [#280](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/280)
- Fix sonar issues, either by improving the code, or by suppressing the warning. [#256](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/256)
- Go through Sonar issues and either improve the code, or ignore the issue. [#254](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/254)
- Clean up the pom's, move version numbers to the properties section [#253](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/253)
- Removed beta note from README.md, and added myself as reviewer. [#250](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/250)
- Remove beta stage note in the readme. [#249](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/249)
- chore: fix the build problems [#201](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/201)
- Cleanup Maven POMs [#200](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/200)
- Separate execution of unit tests from integration tests [#199](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/199)
- feature: implement support for event upcasters, fix #193 [#195](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/195)
- Support Event Upcasters during reading of events [#193](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/193)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Remove KafkaPublisher as conditional, such that it's easier to use the autoconfig. [#307](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/307)

## :hammer_and_wrench: Dependency Upgrade

- build(deps): bump kafka-clients from 3.2.1 to 3.2.2 [#329](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/329)
- build(deps): bump actions/setup-java from 3.4.1 to 3.5.0 [#328](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/328)
- build(deps-dev): bump mockito.version from 4.7.0 to 4.8.0 [#327](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/327)
- build(deps): bump jackson-module-kotlin from 2.13.3 to 2.13.4 [#326](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/326)
- build(deps): bump jackson.version from 2.13.3 to 2.13.4 [#325](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/325)
- build(deps-dev): bump slf4j.version from 1.7.36 to 2.0.0 [#323](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/323)
- build(deps): bump spring.boot.version from 2.7.2 to 2.7.3 [#322](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/322)
- build(deps): bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 [#320](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/320)

name: Axon Kafka Extension v4.5.4
body:
## :star: Features

- Added properties to disable autoconfiguration for publishing and consuming events to/from Kafka [#241](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/241)

## :chart_with_upwards_trend: Enhancements

- Remove the use of a consumer group for StreamableKafkaMessageSource. [#284](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/284)
- Reduce unique consumer group creation when consuming events with Streamable Message Source [#273](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/273)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Changes the buffer so that errors from the fetcher will be thrown once the buffer is empty. [#287](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/287)
- Processor is not going to error mode if the FetchEventTask dies. [#276](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/276)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@gklijs](https://github.com/gklijs)
- [@aupodogov](https://github.com/aupodogov)

name: Axon Kafka Extension v4.5.3
body:
## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- axon-kafka-spring-boot-starter fails when spring-boot-devtools enabled [#240](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/240)

name: Axon Kafka Extension v4.5.1
body:
## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Bugfix/missing xstream exception [#214](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/214)
- Error running example: "The XStream instance is a hard requirement and should be provided" [#213](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/213)

## :hammer_and_wrench: Dependency Upgrade

- build(deps-dev): bump log4j-core from 2.14.1 to 2.15.0 https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/commit/6efd14c8108f8d991a8f07b3b526c0169f4d4e88

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@martink76](https://github.com/martink76)

name: Axon Kafka Extension v4.5
body:
## :chart_with_upwards_trend: Enhancements

- [#6] Update to Axon Framework 4.5 [#167](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/167)
- Axon-spring-boot-starter - kafka version problem [#6](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/6)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Errors in log from docker containers (kafka-axon-example) [#169](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/169)
- TrackingEventProcessor fails to do incremental retry's when TrackingEventProcessor.eventAvailabilityTimeout is set to default 1000 ms [#36](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/36)

## :hammer_and_wrench: Dependency Upgrade

- build(deps): bump actions/setup-java from 2.1.0 to 2.2.0 [#171](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/171)
- build(deps-dev): bump jmh-core.version from 1.32 to 1.33 [#170](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/170)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@smcvb](https://github.com/smcvb)
- [@dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot)

name: Axon Kafka Extension v4.0 - Release Candidate
body:
## :star: Features

- [#17 - Part 3] Introduce the SubscribableKafkaMessageSource implementation [#24](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/24)
- Introduce SubscribableMessageSource implementation [#17](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/17)
- Support of configurable event processors mode to be used for Kafka message publication. [#11](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/11)
- KafkaPublisher should track events instead of subscribing on them [#10](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/10)

## :chart_with_upwards_trend: Enhancements

- Splitted builds into pr and not pr, added ghactions to dependabot and other minors [#148](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/148)
- Provide default value for `defaultTopic` property. [#140](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/140)
- Provide `defaultTopic` property by default [#139](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/139)
- [#114] Removed spring-kafka-test from project and fixed tests [#115](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/115)
- Remove spring-kafka-test [#114](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/114)
- #108 Migrate tests to junit5 and testcontainers [#111](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/111)
- Fix CI build and optimise test process [#108](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/108)
- Enhancement/readme md [#105](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/105)
- README.md change  [#104](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/104)
- Added automatic release notes on milestone closure [#72](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/72)
- [#1382] Support Spring Boot DevTools [#38](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/38)
- [#28] Use TopicPartition as the key for storing offsets [#29](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/29)
- KafkaTrackingToken should specify the topic per partition [#28](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/28)
- [#18 and #25] Introduce a TrackingToken aware ConsumerRebalanceListener [#27](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/27)
- [#21] Verify KafkaProperties property map can be filled [#26](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/26)
- [#17 - Part 2] Define a Group Id prefix and suffix factory [#23](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/23)
- [#17 - Part 1] Adjust Fetcher to allow Tracking and Subscribing [#22](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/22)
- Check for missing Producer/Consumer properties [#21](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/21)
- [#17 / #18 Part 2] Require provisioning of Consumer Group Id [#19](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/19)
- StreamableMessageSource fine tuning to overcome Partitioning / Segmentation discrepancy [#18](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/18)
- Minor Kafka Event Publisher Adjustments [#14](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/14)
- Potential conflict between Kafka partitioning and Axon segmentation [#1](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/1)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- [#34] Introduce a KeyDeserializer for the KafkaTrackingToken [#158](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/158)

- [#84] Subscribing Producer Mode not working as expected [#85](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/85)
- Subscribing Producer Mode not working as expected [#84](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/84)
- [#82] KafkaAutoConfiguration should not be auto-configured after InfraConfiguration [#83](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/83)
- KafkaAutoConfiguration should not be auto-configured after InfraConfiguration [#82](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/82)
- SerializationException while fetching KafkaTrackingToken from JpaTokenStore after processor enters retry mode [#34](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/34)
- Outdated tracking token used upon Kafka partition assignment [#25](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/25)
- [#8] Avoid closing non-transactional Producer after a couple of usages [#16](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/16)
- Fix KafkaTrackingToken#covers [#13](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/13)
- Fix contribution guide [#12](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/12)
- [#8] Avoid closing non-transactional Producer after a couple of usages [#9](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/pull/9)
- DefaultProducerFactory closes non-transactional Kafka Producer after `producerCacheSize` messages were sent [#8](https://github.com/AxonFramework/extension-kafka/issues/8)
